page.title: 13A Day In The Life Of -----.
page.content: I get up at seven o'clock every morning because my dad's alarm clock wakes me up.At around eight o'clock when I'm ready for school I take my dog for a walk.Then at twenty to nine I set off to bike to school. It's about 1 mile from my house to school because I live on the outskirts of Epworth.I go through the village centre because it's not too busy in a morning.At 1st break in a morning there is a tuck shop where you can buy sweets and crisps.We finish school at a quarter to four and I get home at four o'clock and take Digger for another walk.Sometimes I will go and play with my friends and sometimes I go and meet my dad at the farm where he works.Finally I go to bed at around nine o'clock. By James Orton.
